transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Ji?

Customer: Madam Ravindra bol raha hun main Gatiman Hydraulic se.

Executive: Sir kahan se baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Greater Noida se.

Executive: Ji Greater Noida se. Haan sir boliye.

Customer: Madam main isme jo hamara jo package chal raha tha uska invoice load karna hai wo kahan se hoga?

Executive: Invoice seller panel pe jaiyega sir.

Customer: Kahan pe?

Executive: Seller.indiamart.com mein jaiyega.

Customer: Nahi application use kar raha hun main is time.

Executive: Application mein nahi hai sir link mein hai ye.

Customer: Thik hai thik hai chalo google pe.

Executive: Sir main agar aapko kal bhej du to kal chalega?

Customer: Nahi chalna agar aap ho jata hai to aap bhej dete hain aap.

Executive: Sir actually main abhi to room mein aa gayi hun office band ho chuka hai to laptop bhi open karna padega uske liye.

Customer: Nahi main meri taraf se load nahi hoga jaise main karna chahun to.

Executive: Sir aise to ho jata hai but ab usme usse karna padega na sir seller.indiamart.com se karna padega na.

Customer: Haan to aap batate rahiye main kar deta hun usme.

Executive: Sir first of all company ka name bataiye company ka name kya hai sir?

Customer: MS Gatiman Hydraulic.

Executive: Ek minute sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Sir just a wait second sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Sir mere mein to aapki koi company ka aisa show nahi kar raha hai sir.

Customer: Ji number mobile number se check kar lena aap ya GST number bataunga mobile number.

Executive: Number bataiye sir apna ek phone ka.

Customer: Ye wo wala batata hun jo primary number hai mera 75

Executive: 75

Customer: 00

Executive: 00

Customer: 58

Executive: 58

Customer: 5024

Executive: Sir usme aap jaiye seller.indiamart.com mein login kariye.

Customer: Ek.

Customer: Seller.indiamart.com?

Executive: Haan ji sir.

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Sir isme login kiya aapne?

Customer: Abhi ek minute login karta hun main.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Sir ek minute sir. Sir login kar liya aapne?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Page open hua niche aap dekhiyega invoice wala aa raha hoga aapke pass.

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Thik hai sir usme download kariye ek bar agar ho raha hai.

Customer: Madam ye do number the dusra number mere pass hai nahi ye 75 wala to isi number pe OTP jayega agar isse karun to login dusre wale se to ho nahi raha hai.

Executive: Sir dekhiye jo aapka primary number hai usi se login hoga sir dusre number se login nahi hoga sir.

Customer: Thik hai aur ye jo invoice likha aa raha hai yahan se ho jayega fir.

Executive: Ji bataiye aap invoice suniye jo aapka invoice hai sir wo 24 wala chahiye kya aapko?

Customer: Matlab?

Executive: 2024 wala chahiye kya?

Customer: Ji ji.

Executive: To sir dekhiye aapka jo primary number hai wo last mein 75 se start hai last mein 024 hai usi se login kariye ek bar. Ji ji.

Customer: Thik hai madam ye HSN code kya rehta hai waise iska?

Executive: Kya?

Customer: Aapka jo service HSN code rehta hai IndiaMART wale service ka.

Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: Wo kya rehta hai?

Executive: Sir iske bare mein mujhe jyada knowledge nahi hai sir kaun sa code aap puch rahe ho isme?

Customer: Nahi jaise billing hoti hai na jaise service tax wagera hota hai to uska HSN code hota hai har product ka jaise aap service provide karte ho to service provider ek HSN code hota hai billing mein. Aapke pass koi bill ho kisi aur ka.

Executive: Wo suniye suniye wo aapka invoices mein sab rehta hai aapka sir usme sari cheeze mention rehti hai.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Usi mein sari cheeze aapki likhi hui hogi wo download karna padega aapko ek bar download to kariye sir.

Customer: Haan ji kar raha hun madam wo phone na mere pass nahi hai usko call karni padegi mere ko to thoda sa main aapka call disconnect kar raha hun.

Executive: Ji ji thik hai sir.

Customer: Thik.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to load the invoice for package.

- Wants to know the HSN code.



Resolution:

- Executive asked to login through seller panel.

- Executive provided the primary number to login.

- Executive said HSN code is in invoice.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved. Customer will download invoice.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- invoice, hsn code, seller panel
